attributes.action: ask twa to rethink the phase two of the nottingham to chilwell route
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If the T.W.A.give the go ahead to N.E.T.for the proposed route phase two of the tram system Nottingham to Chilwell a lot of elderly people will loose their homes,which they were told it was a home for life.We have to look after our elderly people not shunt them from pillow to post.I am sure a better route could be found.PLEASE GORDON  HELP US.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
